text.author: Santa Barbara Corpus of Spoken American English (ed. John W. Du Bois)
text.title: Atoms Hanging Out
text.summary: At a chemistry demonstration, a presenter shows the audience the different states of matter using water for liquid, ice as a solid and steam as a gas, as well as an experiment involving inserting balloons into a container.
